panels.description: The overall health of the local server cluster
panels.title: Consul Cluster Health

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) since the leader was last able to contact the follower nodes when checking its leader lease

targets.query: SELECT max("90_percentile") FROM "consul_raft_leader_lastContact" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(linear)

panels.title: Leader Last Contact

panels.description: Information about which server is the leader

targets.query: SELECT last("is_leader") AS "Leader" FROM "consul_cluster_servers" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "server_name"

panels.title: Consul Servers

panels.description: The actual and expected number of servers in the Consul cluster

targets.query: SELECT "servers_count" FROM "consul_cluster_health" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "expected_count" FROM "consul_cluster_health" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Servers Count

panels.description:
The counters which are incremented when a Consul server starts an election process.

Consul cluster should have a stable leader. If there are frequent elections or leadership changes, it would likely indicate network issues between the Consul servers, or that the Consul servers themselves are unable to keep up with the load

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "consul_raft_state_candidate" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"

panels.title: Leadership Changes

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) required to complete an update to the KV store

targets.query: SELECT mean("90_percentile") FROM "consul_kvs_apply" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: KV Store Timing

panels.description: The number of Raft transactions occurring over the interval

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "consul_raft_apply" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: Raft Transactions

panels.description: The time (in milliseconds) required to commit a new entry to the Raft log on the leader

targets.query: SELECT mean("90_percentile") FROM "consul_raft_commitTime" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: Raft Log Commit Time

panels.description: The CPU usage by server containers. Limits show the maximum number of CPUs the container can use

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" = '$namespace' AND "pod_name" =~  /kafka-[\d]-[\d]/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

panels.title: Server Container CPU Usage

panels.description: The memory usage by server container. Limits show the maximum amount of memory the container can use

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory/limit" WHERE "type" = 'pod_container' AND "namespace_name" = '$namespace' AND "pod_name" =~ /kafka-[\d]-[\d]/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$side/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), pod_name fill(linear)

panels.title: Server Container Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of bytes allocated by the Consul process

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "consul_runtime_alloc_bytes" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: Consul Process Memory Usage

panels.description: The number of nanoseconds consumed by stop-the-world garbage collection (GC) pauses since Consul started

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("value")) FROM "consul_runtime_total_gc_pause_ns" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: GC Pause

panels.description: The number of stop-the-world garbage collection (GC) runs  since Consul started

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("value")) FROM "consul_runtime_total_gc_pause_ns" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: GC Runs Rate

panels.description: Consul runtime heap objects count.
panels.title: Runtime Heap Objects

panels.description: Disk Volume stats

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("read_time")) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$datacenter$/ AND "role" = 'Server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host" fill(linear)

panels.title: Consul API HTTP Rate By Path

panels.description: This shows the rate of increase for catalog register and deregister operations.

panels.description: Measures the time it takes to complete catalog register or deregister operations.
panels.title: Catalog Operation Time
